item.description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
July 5, 2007 -IMPORTANT NOTICE: Time for Meetup is now 7:00PM
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
July 6, 2007 -Excellent Question from Claudia about parking near
Limelight: You can either
1) use parking lot on LaGrange Street $12.00 I think or
2) find a meter or legal space and park on the street.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
July 6, 2007 -Pictures from the June 30th Meetup have been
posted. Click on the Photos link to see them!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

I am pleased to announce the July 21st Meetup at 7:00PM! We're having it at the Limelight in Boston again, but in a much larger studio this time. Space is limited, so please RSVP right away so we can reserve a spot for you. I have removed the "Maybe" option as in the past, few people who RSVP'd "Maybe" ever attended. The admission fee is $10.00 which is half off their standard studio pricing. I have given you the option of paying in advance through Paypal if you like.

Our members range from semi-professional to first-time karaoke singers. We have excellent performers who provide high quality entertainment for us all, we have beginners who are surprisingly good but nonetheless want a supportive group to try out their talents. Then there are the rest of us in various stages of development. All experience levels are welcome and supported.

Finally, I will be posting pictures from the June 30th Meetup soon. So please come back and take a look at the fun everyone had.

As always, I look forward to meeting you at this Meetup.

Your Meetup Coordinator,
- Phil
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - July 21st
